featured.text: Brahma called a council of the gods to help him decide on a place to hide the divinity.
But Brahma thought 24 would do because he believed humans would dig into the earth and climb every mountain, and eventually find it.
Seeing this, Brahma, the chief god, decided to take their divinity away from them and hide it 22 it could never be found.
Brahma thought for a long time and finally decided to hide their divinity in the center of their own being, for humans would never think to 25 it there.

definition.zh_def: 梵天，印度教和佛教中的創造神，通常被視為宇宙的創造者。
definition.en_def: Brahma, a deity in Hinduism and Buddhism, often regarded as the creator of the universe.
definition.example: In Hindu mythology, Brahma is often depicted with four faces, representing the four Vedas.
